attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think with the increase in gun crime and assaults on officers it's something we now have to consider. If we don't, the criminals have a substantial advantage over the police. It is a sad day for our society, however. I do think we need to make sure the police are properly trained in their use, and more importantly when not to use them.
